content: bring you to the top of the window working into the blo single_crochet x 7 across the top of the window photo 15 working through both loops for the rest of the round single_crochet x 14 25 9-11 single_crochet x 25 25 working through blo across the top of the window 13 14 15 3 you will now work the back window so leave round 11 alone again for a minute a with white yarn and a slip knot already on your hook working into blo join your yarn by making a slip_stitch into the 6th st of round 11 photos 16 and 17 still working in blo single_crochet x 6 photo 18 now slip_stitch through both loops of the next 2 st s photo 19 and turn photo 20 b skip the first 2 st s the slip_stitch s - see photo 21 single_crochet x 6 slip_stitch in the next 2 st s of round 11 and turn please note be careful that you do not work into the st that already contains the slip_stitch from the beginning of row a it should be skipped photos 22 and 23 6 c skip the first 2 st s photo 24 single_crochet x 6 slip_stitch in the next 2 st s of round 11 and turn 6 d skip the first 2 st s single_crochet x 6 slip_stitch in the next st of round 11 chain 1 and bind off see photo 25 6 16 17 18 skip 2 slip_stitch s 2 slip_stitch s end of row a before turning end of row a after turning 19 20 21 next 2 st s of round 11 st containing the slip_stitch viewed from above st containing the slip_stitch first st after the 2 slip_stitch s 22 23 24 4 12 now take up the coloured yarn again single_crochet x 2 this will bring you to the window section photo 26 fpsc x 6 along the white edge photo 27 single_crochet x 9 into the remaining st s of round 11 remembering to skip the st at the base of the window that already con- tains a slip_stitch photo 28 shows round 12 completed 17 13-14 single_crochet x 17 17 15 short row single_crochet x 9 slip_stitch in the next 2 st s and turn 9 16 short row skip the first 2 st s the slip_stitch s single_crochet x 7 slip_stitch in the next 2 st s and turn stuff the car 7 17 short row skip the first 2 st s single_crochet x 7 chain 1 and turn see photo 29 7 18 fold the boot of the car flat with the hook on the fold and slip_stitch through both layers into the next 7 st s photos 30 and 31 chain 1 and bind off photos 32 33 and 34 illustrate what your car should look like now work away your tails and sew your wheels of choice to the sides of the car photos 35 and 36 if you
